_meanings:
{@--4@} To empty
the body by evacuations, void one's
excrement;  
{#tiraskftyoccaretkAzWalozwapatratfRAdinA#} <ls>Ms. 4. 49.</ls>

{@--6@} (Used
in the <ab>Atm.</ab>) ({%a%}) To quit, leave. ({%b%}) To
sin against, be unfaithful (to a 
husband or wife), transgress against;
{#Darmamuccarate#} <ls>Sk.</ls> ({%c%}) To violate or 
transgress in general, stray or deviate
from; <ls>Bk. 8. 31.</ls> ({%d%}) To rise up to,
ascend (trans.); <ls>N. 5. 48</ls>; <ls>Śi. 17. 52.</ls>
